mapper.sql: goodsID, supplierName, jan, feb, mar, apr, may, jun, july, aug, sep, oct, nov, dec
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goodsID, supplierName, jan, feb, mar, apr, may, jun, july, aug, sep, oct, nov, dec) values (#{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suppliername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jan,jdbcType=REAL}, #{feb,jdbcType=REAL}, #{mar,jdbcType=REAL}, #{apr,jdbcType=REAL}, #{may,jdbcType=REAL}, #{jun,jdbcType=REAL}, #{july,jdbcType=REAL}, #{aug,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sep,jdbcType=REAL}, #{oct,jdbcType=REAL}, #{nov,jdbcType=REAL}, #{dec,jdbcType=REAL})

update goods
supplierName = #{suppliername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where goodsID = #{goodsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
